name: KMCCommander
0:
”Alexa, ask k. m. c. commander to list all projects”
”Alexa, tell k. m. c. commander to list all rooms”
”Alexa, ask k. m. c. commander to list all alarms”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: k. m. c. commander
Developer Terms of Use
des: KMC Commander enables advanced management and automation of your commercial IoT system. The Commander skill for Alexa allows you to check the status of critical alarms and manage your Commander system from anywhere in the world through just your voice.
